name: More Bat Eyes
tooltip:
More Bat Eyes

<name>, the attraction I'm designing will be the scariest event since Gnomeregan was overrun!  And it's largely thanks to you and all the baubles you've brought me.  Many, many thanks!

I don't need much else, but... if you bring me more evil bat eyes from the bats of the Eastern Plaguelands... I might have more Darkmoon Faire tickets for you.

Requirements:
- Evil Bat Eye x 10
